website_summaries.verdict: These welding sleeves are simple to adjust and proven to perform.
pros: Side-split cowhide welding sleeves are designed to cover the entire arm
Adjustable snap wrists, take-up strap and support sling make it easy to put the sleeves on and take them off
Does not cause yellowing or discoloration when wearing the sleeves with a white t-shirt or other clothing
cons: May be too wide on the shoulders, resulting in too much room between the sleeves and your arms

customer_reviews.title: great sleeves
customer_reviews.text: excellent sleeves, no yellowing or discoloration even when i wear plain white T-shirts. after hours of overhead they barely have a mark on them. the size is right as i have broad shoulders, large frame and neck. the adjustable straps make putting them on and taking them off very easy.
customer_reviews.author: BBearden

customer_reviews.title: Great product looks as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product looks as advertised. Fast shipping the material is a sturdy cowhide leather jacket type of material looks very sturdy the arms are a little baggy but very comfortable and they do cover all of the arm area it can fit a 6 foot person. The arms come in 2 sleeves, not one piece. With slings on both sleeves that go over the neck. The neck slings may be a little constricting. But for the price, its a really good products for the protection.
customer_reviews.author: 18213514 O.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's okay one sleeve at a time but using both will feel like being chocked. It just gets tighter around my neck longer I use it. I tossed one and only use one on my left arm. So uncomfortable it wants to shift forward and have to constantly 're adjust. So meh.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a negative review on the wrong welding sleeves. I’m here to try to rectify that. This product works well. Keeps the sparks from burning your arms and it’s recommended by my brother who this was bought for (a welder).
customer_reviews.author: Casondra

customer_reviews.title: did the job for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Does not give protection for overhead welding, but it does a good job in protecting the arms during hot weather when the full bib ensemble is not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: probably in like 10 years because its super rugged
customer_reviews.text: 5 out of 5 stars! This is a geat product my left arm gets burnt A Lot and my wife got tired of seeing new battle wounds every evening and made me buy this. I ended up loving it so much. Keeps the heat down and protects and after a month or 2 its at all soft and you barely notice its even on. I weld High amperage MIG and I dont weld without this sleeve anymore. I will definitely buy another one whenever this one wears out, probably in like 10 years because its super rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product regularly at work and I love it. Sleeves fit pretty loose but are comfortable. I usually just wear one at a time since most of the sparks fall on my left arm when I weld. Really recommend these rather than buying the entire leather jacket since it could get pretty hot. Honestly think every welder should have a pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Stops the burns baby stops the burns
customer_reviews.text: Does the job works pretty well a little bigger than I expected but it's cool
customer_reviews.author: TIM

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Depending on what you are wearing under it the shoulder seams are a bit of a PITA but overall it is good quality, durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Great price- well made. My husband welds daily with these sleeves- they save him from many burns. He said that they are made just as well as the very expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: KWinFL

customer_reviews.title: Great leather with a good tanning job
customer_reviews.text: Great leather with a good tanning job, no stink, and a firm napp. They were a little difficult to sort out how to wear, but they do the job. A nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Rankins

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff but...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a size small t shirt it was to baggie on him but with a sweater on its ok
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any welder
customer_reviews.text: Great sleevs, been using for three weeks now. No discoloration to skin, I do a lot of overhead and no burns to my arms or sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: TreacherousIntellect

customer_reviews.title: NOT JUST FOR WELDING!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my cousin's husband who is on blood thinners and cuts car tires up. He says they have save him numerous injuries, are sturdy but soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tody

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: They're well made. But way too broad to fit me correctly in the shoulders. Great for maybe bigger or bodybuilding sized fellas. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Can be restricting but it does what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Fenceguy78

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortably, a little odd feeling if you wear both at the same time because of the straps, but not bad. All around good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials for the buckle and poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: The clips are cheap and broke on me after one week. They are fine for coverage as well as protection, but it doesn't have a good strap for tightening down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke the first time I tried it on
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Clips kinda suck
customer_reviews.text: The straps are not cut right to really tighten the neck loops. Decent though, haven't tested it against heat yet.
customer_reviews.author: Various

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: preforms well a little tight in the neck should be one piece with a neck ring.
customer_reviews.author: DAN JENSEN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: had to add an extra snap thing for my small wrists but other than that its perfect
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing i have ever wasted my monet on for work. While welding the damn things choke me. These are the worst idea for welding sleeves ever. Even though they come with a warranty the company wont do a dam thing about it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are too wide on the shoulders, too much room betwen the sleeves and your arms
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for protection in the summer outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Bought to pick wild berries to protect my husband's arms. Think thorns! Although they are intended for welding and probably work well for that purpose. My husband found these to be constricting at the neck and super hot/held in heat to pick berries. It was a good idea on his part but it didn't exactly with the way he'd envisioned.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Revco Stallion 23 SLV Quality Side Split Cowhide Welding Sleeves, Black
product_meta.description: Size:23Inch LengthBlack stallion 23slv 23" quality side split cowhide welding sleeves MFG 23SLV features: 23" side split cowhide leather sleeve, adjustable snap wrists, adjustable take-up strap, adjustable support sling, stitched with flame-resistant Kevlar sleeve length: 23".

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars73 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
